name: HitHat
description:
This game aims to complete all the levels, collect all the checkpoints and get all the skins of balls from the store, collect all the points and complete the game as quickly as possible, after completing the game - it does not end, but only continues. Passing some levels seems difficult every time you pass something very simple, the level of the game is constantly increasing and will not let you get bored, solve problems and puzzles related to the passage of the level and reach the last checkpoint using your ingenuity and dexterity!

To reach the last checkpoint, you must carefully - falling, go through many different levels, the game is automatically saved on the checkpoint, do not forget to increase points and buy new balls for successful completion

A fascinating and cubic world is waiting for you! Control a balanced ball and pass a variety of obstacles and traps, your goal is to reach the end of the level, but it will be very difficult to do it, the most important thing is not to fall!
